definitions.definition: Strictly attentive to detail ; meticulous or fastidious , particularly to codes or conventions .
examples: With a punctilious slap of the gloves, the duel was now inevitable.

definitions.definition: Precise or scrupulous ; finicky or nitpicky .

main_definition: Strictly attentive to detail ; meticulous or fastidious , particularly to codes or conventions .
secondary_definitions: Precise or scrupulous ; finicky or nitpicky .
